text: “Ndipo m’menemo iwo adzakuwa (adzalira uku akunena): “Mbuye wathu! Titulutseni (m’Moto ndi kutibweza pa dziko lapansi); tikachita ntchito zabwino, osati zija tinkachita.” (Allah adzawauza): “Kodi sitidakupatseni moyo wokwanira wotheka kukumbuka kwa wokumbuka? Ndiponso mchenjezi adakudzerani. Choncho lawani (chilango). Ndipo anthu ochita zoipa alibe mpulumutsi.”
